segments.text: Welcome to Perfect Getaway Tours . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to plan a surprise getaway for me and my wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , we have a couple of different options such as beaches , the wilderness , the countryside or even going to a spa for the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think something in the countryside would be nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perfect ! This package includes round-trip flights to New Hampshire . A free airport pick - up is included . Our VIP limousine will pick you up and provide you with complimentary champagne and finger
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good ! What is the hotel that we will be staying at like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is the best part.Your hotel is actually an old country villa that has been restored and refurbished to accommodate a maximum of that is guests.You will enjoy an intimate and private time in this
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! This sounds like something my wife would really enjoy ! Are there any outdoor activities we can take part in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! The hotel has a stable with beautiful stallions for a very romantic horseback ride along the country trail . You can also go fishing to the nearby lake or visit the local vineyard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sold ! I want to book this trip . I don ’ t care what it costs ! Money is no object !
segments.speaker: S2
